LanguageData.SlideAutomated.label: automated slide
LanguageData.SlideAutomated.description:
A mechanical treademill on floor built from gears and bearings to walk really faster.
•Don't support builds. •Set on smoothed floors. •Very fast, neutral beautiful. •Don't need energy. •Deteriorate in 1 year.
